body.p: First thing I tell folks this week about big time we have at La Crosse Saturday and Winnebago Indians help have program when bridge open. Reporter for LA Crosse Tribune look me up Indian reporter and he ask me about what to call bridge and we have talk and I tell him best thing call bridge Winnebago bridge and he say that’s fine and going to tell people in La Crosse Tribune to call it that. Reporters for La Crosse paper and St. Paul papers and Minneapolis and another place in Iowa all come around where I am and everybody joke and have big laugh with Indian reporter. They tell me Indian reporter know all over United States and people go by and reporters say Hey! George, or Henry and like that and come over and meet Tomah Indian reporter and pretty soon everybody come around where I am and all people everybody tell me I am good reporter and lot of fellows write down name of paper where I write Indian news for and say they want to take paper to read Indian news I write. Reporter for Minneapolis paper tell Indian reporter he is coming here to see me and have talk with Kenny that I write news for and see if maybe I can write same thing for Minneapolis paper. I tell folks once before maybe some time I have desk in office like big shot white reporters and I go around places in airplane like fellows that come to La Crosse when bridge open. Duck season look pretty good for hunters this year and I want to tell about today Indian reporter see ducks on swamp and they stay around same place and I stand long time and watch them and I know pretty sure they not going to stay just little while and fly up and go away and when they do like that I know because I have been hunter long time duck hunting going to be pretty good. I tell you how I sneak up in weeds just like skunk go through weeds and don’t make noise and I get right up to where decks sit on water when I go way wind come from. I stay in swamp long time and kneel like and watch what ducks are doing and maybe white man fame warden pretty near too and all time watch Frisk Cloud and think maybe just when I sneak up on ducks in swamp and stay long time in swamp maybe I am going to shoot one to eat. I fool game warden and I wait until season open and then I tell you one thing pretty sure I get my share and I know good places to hunt and I have been hunter for long time. .
